channel.title: nb on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in nb on Barefoot Rob

item.title: 1 hour lesson at NB
item.description: (written 12:50 Friday 06 October 2017 JST) Worked at NB on Tuesday, my first lesson there that only lasted 1 hour. Boo. It was okay going all the way there for 2 hours, but just for 1 hour kinda sucks. I hope we can work out something else, like maybe they buy lunch as well.

item.title: free lunch after lesson at NB
item.description: 01:40 Wednesday 30 August 2017 JST Today after teaching for 2 hours at NB, they offered me lunch! Yay! Today was Yusuke’s last day! Booo!! All the students seemed to enjoy the lesson! Yay!!

item.title: new lesson
item.description: 17:52 Tuesday 18 July 2017 JST Met new students for a first lesson in Nihonbashi. Five beginner students who all seem pretty genki. Some are more beginner than others. JB was there to do the introduction and everything went smoothly. See you guys again next week! “I’m glad to hear that!”
